ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT(RecordTypeId = "0129s0000004IoGAAU") && ISPICKVAL(Case__r.Outlet_Activity__r.Activity__c, "47302") && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Service__c, "8") || ISPICKVAL(Service__c, "90") || ISPICKVAL(Service__c, "3") || ISPICKVAL(Service__c, "21") || ISPICKVAL(Service__c, "151") || ISPICKVAL(Service__c, "152") || ISPICKVAL(Service__c, "2") || ISPICKVAL(Service__c, "98"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This case has the Outlet Activity TEI Community Support. The Service must be: Advocacy/Support, Business Planning, Education & Skills, Facilitate Employment, Indigenous Advocacy or Healing Workshops, Information/Advice/Referral, Social Participation.
